system.description:
When you issue a command to someone below your rank, they'll do it immediately, no questions asked. Someone is below your rank if they are of your People, if they are a Companion, or if they serve or follow someone who has shown you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.heir.Item.AxHgvkHalfeNMt7b]{Royal Treatment}. You never need to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.3lOlQnDdQRaiR47g]{Talk Sense} to someone who is below your rank.

When you give a command that directly harms the person you gave the command to, they become immune to this move forever.
